message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.GT

This paper involves the use of deep reinforcement learning to create AI agents for a real-time fighting game, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of neural networks (cs.LG) and computer vision (cs.CV) in the training process. Additionally, the paper involves game theory (cs.GT) in the creation of a self-play curriculum for the agents. Finally, the paper discusses the exploration of vast action spaces (cs.GR) in the training process.
